alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 04 at 11:49AM MDT until November 05 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT SATURDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches, with up to 2 feet for elevations above 6,000 feet. * WIND...Frequent wind gusts of 40 to 60 mph will develop for all elevations between 8pm Friday night through 8am Saturday morning. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce, Dixie, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 11 AM PDT Friday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 11 AM Friday to 11 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
